points.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties

case.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
case.localized_title: Votre contenu peut être cédé sous licence à des tiers
case.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

points.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services

case.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser votre contenu pour tous ses services existants et futurs.

points.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

case.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
case.localized_title: Votre contenu peut être distribué par tous les médias connus aujourd'hui ou à l'avenir

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.localized_title: Le service est fourni "en l'état" et doit être utilisé à vos risques et périls.
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: No guarantee is given regarding quality

case.title: No guarantee is given regarding quality
case.localized_title: Aucune garantie n'est donnée quant à la qualité
case.description: The Service doesn't warrant or guarantee the quality of the products or services provided.

points.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

case.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
case.localized_title: Il vous est interdit d'envoyer des chaînes de lettres, du courrier indésirable, du spam ou tout autre message non sollicité.
case.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

points.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

case.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité quant au contenu des liens vers d'autres sites web
case.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

case.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
case.localized_title: Des archives de leurs accords sont fournies afin que les changements puissent être visualisés au fil du temps.
case.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

case.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
case.localized_title: Le service ne garantit pas l'exactitude ou la fiabilité des informations fournies
case.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

case.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
case.localized_title: Les conditions peuvent être modifiées à tout moment, à leur discrétion, sans préavis.
case.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

points.title: Your use is throttled

case.title: Your use is throttled
case.localized_title: Votre utilisation est limitée
case.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.

points.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

case.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
case.localized_title: L'affichage de contenu pornographique est interdit
case.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.

points.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites

case.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
case.localized_title: Ce service vous informe que ses conditions d'utilisation ne s'appliquent pas aux sites web de tiers.
case.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.

points.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed

case.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed
case.localized_title: Les comptes alternatifs ne sont pas autorisés
case.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.

points.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

case.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de ne pas soumettre de contenu diffamatoire, harcelant ou menaçant.
case.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

points.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

case.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
case.localized_title: Vous devez signaler au service toute utilisation non autorisée de votre compte ou toute violation de la sécurité
case.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.

points.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

case.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties
case.localized_title: Vous ne pouvez pas distribuer ou divulguer votre compte à des tiers
case.description: In this context third-parties refers to anyone including friends, family, or company

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason

case.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason
case.localized_title: Le contenu que vous publiez peut être modifié par le service pour quelque raison que ce soit
case.description: This service can edit any content on the service for whatever the reason and at their sole discretion.

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

case.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
case.localized_title: La nullité d'une partie des conditions d'utilisation n'entraîne pas la nullité de la partie restante
case.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.

points.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials

case.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable de tous les risques, dommages ou pertes que vous pourriez encourir en téléchargeant du matériel
case.description: Users are responsible for any harm to their computer system or loss of data they may incur through the download of materials from the service.

points.title: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

case.title: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
case.localized_title: Vous disposez d'un délai réduit pour intenter une action en justice contre le service
case.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur.

points.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.localized_title: Certains contenus peuvent être supprimés sans raison et sans préavis.
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

case.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
case.localized_title: Le fait de ne pas appliquer une disposition des conditions d'utilisation ne constitue pas une renonciation à cette disposition.
case.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

points.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

case.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
case.localized_title: Ce service ne cautionne aucune idée contenue dans les contenus générés par les utilisateurs.

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Les informations vous concernant sont recueillies par des tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont vos données personnelles sont utilisées
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont ils collectent les données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.

points.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

case.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
case.localized_title: Vous êtes informé des risques liés à la publication d'informations personnelles en ligne

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Votre adresse IP est collectée, ce qui peut être utilisé pour connaître votre position approximative.

points.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

case.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
case.localized_title: L'application requise pour ce service nécessite des autorisations étendues de l'appareil.
case.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.

points.title: Your biometric data may be collected

case.title: Your biometric data is collected
case.localized_title: Vos données biométriques peuvent être collectées
case.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.

points.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles peuvent être utilisées à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: You must provide your identifiable information

case.title: You must provide your identifiable information
case.localized_title: Vous devez fournir vos informations d'identification
case.description: The Service requires users to provide their identifiable information, including phone number, iD number or other information, even though this data collection isn’t essential for the purposes of the service. They may still allow pseudonyms in the foreground.

points.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées pour faire de la publicité ciblée par des tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: Information is provided about security practices

case.title: Information is provided about security practices
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur les pratiques en matière de sécurité
case.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: First-party cookies are used

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Utilisation de cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: You may be tracked via social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez être suivi par les cookies/pixels des médias sociaux.
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

case.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
case.localized_title: Ce service permet de savoir quelle page web vous a renvoyé vers lui
case.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

points.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection

case.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection
case.localized_title: Vos données sont traitées et stockées dans un pays moins favorable à la protection de la vie privée des utilisateurs.
case.description: This case means that user data is not anywhere in the world, but somewhere where it is more likely to be obtained and used by government and/or possible data analysts.

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service partage vos données personnelles avec des tiers qui ne sont pas impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

case.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
case.localized_title: Le service peut conserver un enregistrement sécurisé et anonyme de vos données à des fins d'analyse, même après la période de conservation des données.
case.description: The data retention period states how long a service keeps user data. In this case, the service may anonymize the personal data after its retention period is over and use it for analytical or research purposes.

points.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service

case.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service
case.localized_title: Ils stockent des données sur vous même si vous n'avez pas interagi avec le service.
case.description: Some services store data on you even if you did not provide that data yourself. For example, users might provide access to their address book, after which a service might also store the phone numbers of that person's contacts.

points.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

case.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
case.localized_title: Le service prétend être conforme au GDPR pour les utilisateurs européens.
case.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.

points.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

case.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
case.localized_title: Les journaux sont conservés pendant une période indéfinie.
case.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.

points.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service

case.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
case.localized_title: Les mineurs doivent avoir l'autorisation de leur tuteur légal pour utiliser le service.
case.description: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the services. The legal guardians are responsible for the use of the service by the minor.

points.title: This service is only available for commercial use

case.title: This service is only available for commercial use
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est disponible que pour un usage commercial
case.description: Users can’t use the Service for individual or personal purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for business to business (B2B).

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.localized_title: Ce service ne garantit pas que lui-même ou les produits obtenus par son intermédiaire répondent à vos attentes ou à vos exigences
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (China)

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
case.localized_title: Le tribunal qui régit les conditions se trouve dans une juridiction moins favorable à la protection de la vie privée des utilisateurs (Chine).
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.

points.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

case.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
case.localized_title: Vous vous engagez à ne pas utiliser le service à des fins illégales
case.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

points.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users

case.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
case.localized_title: Ce service ne peut être tenu responsable des litiges que vous pourriez avoir avec d'autres utilisateurs
case.description: You are responsible for the interactions and the disputes that may occur with other users of the Service. In the event of a dispute, you release the Service from all claims resulting from it.

points.title: Your provided identifiable information is actively checked by the service

case.title: Your provided identifiable information is actively checked by the service
case.localized_title: Les informations identifiables que vous avez fournies sont activement vérifiées par le service
case.description: The service checks if the required identifiable information you've provided is correct, and may do so on a regular basis. The check measures could be analyzing your browser information and/or providing the identifiable information to a third-party or the authority, thus compromising your anonymity.

points.title: Many different types of personal data are collected

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.localized_title: De nombreux types de données personnelles sont collectés
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour la publicité
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: Your personal data is used for advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

case.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de défendre, d'indemniser et de dégager le service de toute responsabilité en cas de réclamation liée à votre utilisation du service.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

case.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser la publicité ciblée
case.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

case.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
case.localized_title: Votre contenu peut être distribué par tous les médias connus aujourd'hui ou à l'avenir
